sentences.sContent: The highlands are populated mainly by peasant farmers.

synos.tran: 居住于；构成人口；移民于；殖民于

remMethod.val: popul(人) + ate(使…) → 使人在某处安家 → (大批地)居住于

words.tran: 人口；[生物] 种群，[生物] 群体；全体居民
居住于…中；构成…的人口（populate的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: if an area is populated by a particular group of people, they live there
